summary: GamePage.tsx appears to implement the “only one brick removal per session/page load” gating by preventing further brick clicks once any brick is removed. The congratulatory text and clue-section removal cannot be fully verified from the truncated diff; the exact required message string is not fully visible and no evidence is shown that the clue/hint section was removed.

missing_requirements.requirement: After the user removes their single allowed brick, display the exact text behind the brick wall: "Congrats ! You just got your first REAL WORLD ASSET" (not visible before removal).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff is truncated at the point where the hidden text is rendered (it only shows "Con..."), so there is no evidence the full exact required string is displayed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the clue/hint section at the bottom of the Game page (including the clue image card and accompanying hint text), leaving no clue-related UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided GamePage.tsx diff is truncated before the bottom of the page; there is no evidence showing the clue/hint section was removed or is no longer rendered.
